title: BEX ERROR LEAGUE how to fix?
body:
getting this app crash all the time. See image. It seems RIOT doesn't want everybody to gain elo. This app is very random and stay's untill Riot updates league of legends client. Then league works, but does the same a few day's later. Which makes me unable to play for severals day's again. Really cool!(not) I had that like 7 times already (thanks for demoting RIOT). Waste of time game like this... After all those years they still can't make a decent client that is stable. What a joke.

I've searched the internet and seems im not the only one. 

Link image error: https://ibb.co/gU2BWQ
(i've copied all the text)

How to fix it. it's very anoying because i only got this with leauge of legends, no other game. It reminds me of the queue system, which REALLY SUCKS

replies.body:
Hi, my friend got the same problem and i've found the problem.
His Anti-Virus blocked something from Lol (he use Avast) i have make an exception for the "Riot Game" folder and the problem is fixed now!
Try to do the same with your Anti-Virus and if it didn't works, just disable him when the game load or when you play.

I hope that helped you ! 

(Sorry for my bad english i'm French ^^ )

From those screenshots, it looks like your entire client is crashing for some reason. There's a number of things that could be causing it, like corrupted game files, so be sure to go through each step in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Let me know if you're still crashing after that.
